abstract: Wedding band musicians endure increasing competition and little respect.
snippet: Wedding band musicians endure increasing competition and little respect.
lead_paragraph: Wedding season is just around the corner, and soon the streets of Delhi will be full of marching brass bands in colorful, shiny, ill-fitting jackets and pants. No Indian wedding seems to be complete without sonorous trumpets and drums playing classic Hindustani songs or the latest Bollywood item numbers.
